amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to require the Secretary to conduct a study of the status of the project for flood damage reduction and environmental restoration for the Muddy River authorized by WRDA 2000. The Secretary is required to submit a report to Congress describing the study and reasons for deauthorizing the project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Nolan.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
